reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and perfect for formal occasions, with one noting it's engagement photo-worthy. The material receives mixed feedback - while some praise its nice thickness, others find it cheap polyester. The dress fits beautifully, is comfortable, and is easy to find the right size, particularly suitable for plus-size bodies. However, several customers report issues with the top portion not staying down. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very elegant
items.body: Bought it for my daughter. She looked beautiful in it. Material is soft and has stretch. Very comfortable and elegant. I did not detect a smells. Material weight and thickness was great and was not see through. It fit her beautifully and she liked the color. Read more
items.author: P. Melgar

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a special night out
items.body: This was such a wonderful dress. It was super comfortable and the material felt so nice! Was true to size and fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Liz Buchanan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t stay in place
items.body: The dress is great quality and it looks absolutely amazing on the body. But don’t even get me STARTED on the fashion malfunctions. I knew the top wouldn’t stay in place very well when I bought it but I didn’t realize that even with permanent fashion tape and freaking pins it still won’t stay in place. I bought this dress as a wedding guest and every 30 seconds I’m fixing the top. Absolutely do not buy unless you’re good at sewing and can fix the top to stay in place. And I’m not talking it shifts a little I mean the entire top rolls up and touches my chin. It’s giving Disney villain with the big ahh collars. Read more
items.author: Bree s

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress for Weddings—Flattering, Comfortable, and Fun
items.body: I wore this dress to my friend’s wedding, and let me just say—it made me feel like an absolute princess. As a curvier girl with a little apron belly, I was nervous about how it would sit, but this dress draped beautifully and gave me so much confidence. I got tons of compliments and honestly felt stunning all night. The fabric is a nice heavier quality that feels expensive, but it didn’t weigh me down at all—it was breathable, easy to move in, and perfect for dancing and having fun. I never felt restricted or overheated, which made it such a win for a long wedding day. The only small frustration was that the top part of the dress tends to roll up a bit. I ended up sewing it down myself, which wasn’t a huge deal, but it would’ve been nice if that detail was finished better. Overall, the fit, comfort, and look were everything I wanted. If you’re plus-size and looking for something classy, flattering, and twirl-worthy—this dress is it. Read more
items.author: Halie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: So beautiful, I’m more on the heavier side and I feel like this made me look smaller than I was. Easy to put on and off, the material doesn’t feel cheap had a nice thick ness, it doesn’t have pockets is a down side and another down side is the top kept rolling up but wasn’t to hard to adjust myself Read more
items.author: Zelda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Wore this for a courthouse elopment prior to our big ceremony and it was a DREAM. A smidge tight in the mid section and the off the shoulder portion would have benefitting from a good startch and press, but it was true to size, lovely quality, and even a bit of stretch for comfort and good fit. This was the 7th dress I had ordered and it was the ONE. Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I love this dress I wear a size 12 and I'm about 5"3 so I got a lg and it fit me perfectly. It's a little transparent, the A line style was a good fit for my frame. Read more
items.author: Teresa Blount

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good comfortable dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. Bought this for my daughter and it fit her perfectly and she loved it! Good quality and good design. Read more
items.author: May

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Cocktail Evening Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Cocktail Evening Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Blue, Royalblue, Apricot, Rose, Light Green, Black, Red, Navy, Pink, White, Purple, Teal, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
